segments.text: This whole scene is actually quite unsettling when you think about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer waste of water from that overflowing sink is irritating me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just running and running, completely unchecked and going nowhere useful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at the stream pouring over the cabinets; that's going to cause real damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wooden cabinets and constant water exposure don't mix well at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor, it's becoming a complete mess, soaking wet and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly unaware of such a significant event right next to them?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost unbelievable, her focus on that plate is just too absolute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children's antics, while risky, are at least understandable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the unchecked environmental waste and property damage potential really grates on me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire kitchen is being gradually ruined, and no one is stopping it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a frustrating display of obliviousness and inefficiency.
segments.speaker: PAR
